 1458: %%
 1459: %% Testcase:
 1460: %%   monitor_nodes
 1461: %%
 1462: 
 1463: monitor_nodes_misc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1464:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_misc/2, Config).
 1465: 
 1466: monitor_nodes_misc(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1467:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1468:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1469:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, all}, nodedown_reason]),
 1470:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [nodedown_reason, {node_type, all}, connection_id]),
 1471:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true}),
 1472:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true, connection_id => true}),
 1473:     Names = get_numbered_nodenames(3, node),
 1474:     [NN1, NN2, NN3] = Names,
 1475: 
 1476:     {ok, N1} = start_node(DCfg, NN1),
 1477:     {ok, N2} = start_node(DCfg, NN2, "-hidden"),
 1478: 
 1479:     receive {nodeup, N1} -> ok end,
 1480: 
 1481:     receive {nodeup, N1, #{node_type := visible}} -> ok end,
 1482:     receive {nodeup, N2, #{node_type := hidden}} -> ok end,
 1483:     receive {nodeup, N1, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1484:     receive {nodeup, N2, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1485: 
 1486:     NodesInfo = erlang:nodes(connected, #{connection_id => true}),
 1487: 
 1488:     {N1, #{connection_id := N1CId}} = lists:keyfind(N1, 1, NodesInfo),
 1489:     {N2, #{connection_id := N2CId}} = lists:keyfind(N2, 1, NodesInfo),
 1490: 
 1491:     ct:pal("N1: ~p ~p~n", [N1, N1CId]),
 1492:     ct:pal("N2: ~p ~p~n", [N2, N2CId]),
 1493: 
 1494:     receive {nodeup, N1, #{node_type := visible, connection_id := N1CId}} -> ok end,
 1495:     receive {nodeup, N2, #{node_type := hidden, connection_id := N2CId}} -> ok end,
 1496: 
 1497:     N1UpInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, visible},{connection_id, N1CId}]),
 1498:     N2UpInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, hidden},{connection_id, N2CId}]),
 1499: 
 1500:     receive {nodeup, N1, UpN1Info} -> N1UpInfoSorted = lists:sort(UpN1Info) end,
 1501:     receive {nodeup, N2, UpN2Info} -> N2UpInfoSorted = lists:sort(UpN2Info) end,
 1502: 
 1503:     stop_node(N1),
 1504:     stop_node(N2),
 1505: 
 1506:     receive {nodedown, N1} -> ok end,
 1507: 
 1508:     receive {nodedown, N1, #{node_type := visible,
 1509:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed}} -> ok end,
 1510:     receive {nodedown, N1, #{node_type := visible,
 1511:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed,
 1512:                              connection_id := N1CId}} -> ok end,
 1513:     receive {nodedown, N2, #{node_type := hidden,
 1514:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed}} -> ok end,
 1515:     receive {nodedown, N2, #{node_type := hidden,
 1516:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed,
 1517:                              connection_id := N2CId}} -> ok end,
 1518: 
 1519:     N1ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, visible},
 1520:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed}]),
 1521:     N1BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, visible},
 1522:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed},
 1523:                                     {connection_id, N1CId}]),
 1524:     N2ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, hidden},
 1525:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed}]),
 1526:     N2BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, hidden},
 1527:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed},
 1528:                                     {connection_id, N2CId}]),
 1529: 
 1530:     receive
 1531:         {nodedown, N1, N1Info1} ->
 1532:             case lists:sort(N1Info1) of
 1533:                 N1ADownInfoSorted ->
 1534:                     receive
 1535:                         {nodedown, N1, N1Info2} ->
 1536:                             N1BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N1Info2)
 1537:                     end;
 1538:                 N1BDownInfoSorted ->
 1539:                     receive
 1540:                         {nodedown, N1, N1Info2} ->
 1541:                             N1ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N1Info2)
 1542:                     end
 1543:             end
 1544:     end,
 1545:     receive
 1546:         {nodedown, N2, N2Info1} ->
 1547:             case lists:sort(N2Info1) of
 1548:                 N2ADownInfoSorted ->
 1549:                     receive
 1550:                         {nodedown, N2, N2Info2} ->
 1551:                             N2BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N2Info2)
 1552:                     end;
 1553:                 N2BDownInfoSorted ->
 1554:                     receive
 1555:                         {nodedown, N2, N2Info2} ->
 1556:                             N2ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N2Info2)
 1557:                     end
 1558:             end
 1559:     end,
 1560: 
 1561:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [{node_type, all}, nodedown_reason]),
 1562:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [nodedown_reason, {node_type, all}, connection_id]),
 1563:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true}),
 1564:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true, connection_id => true}),
 1565: 
 1566:     {ok, N3} = start_node(DCfg, NN3),
 1567:     receive {nodeup, N3} -> ok end,
 1568:     stop_node(N3),
 1569:     receive {nodedown, N3} -> ok end,
 1570:     print_my_messages(),
 1571:     ok = check_no_nodedown_nodeup(1000),
 1572:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1573:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1574:     ok.
 1575: 
 1576: 
 1577: %% Tests that {nodeup, Node} messages are received before
 1578: %% messages from Node and that {nodedown, Node} messages are
 1579: %% received after messages from Node.
 1580: monitor_nodes_otp_6481(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1581:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_otp_6481/2, Config).
 1582: 
 1583: monitor_nodes_otp_6481(DCfg, Config) ->
 1584:     io:format("Testing nodedown...~n"),
 1585:     monitor_nodes_otp_6481_test(DCfg, Config, nodedown),
 1586:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1587:     io:format("Testing nodeup...~n"),
 1588:     monitor_nodes_otp_6481_test(DCfg, Config, nodeup),
 1589:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1590:     ok.
 1591: 
 1592: monitor_nodes_otp_6481_test(DCfg, Config, TestType) when is_list(Config) ->
 1593:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1594:     NodeMsg = make_ref(),
 1595:     Me = self(),
 1596:     [Name] = get_nodenames(1, monitor_nodes_otp_6481),
 1597:     case TestType of
 1598: 	nodedown -> ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true);
 1599: 	nodeup -> ok
 1600:     end,
 1601:     Seq = lists:seq(1,10000),
 1602:     MN = spawn_link(
 1603: 	   fun () ->
 1604: 		   lists:foreach(
 1605: 		     fun (_) ->
 1606: 			     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true)
 1607: 		     end,
 1608: 		     Seq),
 1609: 		   Me ! {mon_set, self()},
 1610: 		   receive after infinity -> ok end
 1611: 	   end),
 1612:     receive {mon_set, MN} -> ok end,
 1613:     case TestType of
 1614: 	nodedown -> ok;
 1615: 	nodeup -> ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true)
 1616:     end,
 1617: 
 1618:     %% Whitebox:
 1619:     %% nodedown test: Since this process was the first one monitoring
 1620:     %%                nodes this process will be the first one notified
 1621:     %%                on nodedown.
 1622:     %% nodeup test:   Since this process was the last one monitoring
 1623:     %%                nodes this process will be the last one notified
 1624:     %%                on nodeup
 1625: 
 1626:     %% Verify the monitor_nodes order expected
 1627:     TestMonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1628:     %% io:format("~p~n", [TestMonNodeState]),
 1629:     TestMonNodeState =
 1630: 	case TestType of
 1631: 	    nodedown -> [];
 1632: 	    nodeup -> [{self(), []}]
 1633: 	end
 1634: 	++ lists:map(fun (_) -> {MN, []} end, Seq)
 1635: 	++ case TestType of
 1636: 	       nodedown -> [{self(), []}];
 1637: 	       nodeup -> []
 1638: 	   end
 1639: 	++ MonNodeState,
 1640: 
 1641:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name, "", this),
 1642:     receive {nodeup, Node} -> ok end,
 1643: 
 1644:     RemotePid = spawn(Node,
 1645: 		      fun () ->
 1646: 			      receive after 1500 -> ok end,
 1647: 			      %% infinite loop of msgs
 1648: 			      %% we want an endless stream of messages and the kill
 1649: 			      %% the node mercilessly.
 1650: 			      %% We then want to ensure that the nodedown message arrives
 1651: 			      %% last ... without garbage after it.
 1652: 			      _ = spawn(fun() -> node_loop_send(Me, NodeMsg, 1) end),
 1653: 			      receive {Me, kill_it} -> ok end,
 1654: 			      halt()
 1655: 		      end),
 1656: 
 1657:     net_kernel:disconnect(Node),
 1658:     receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end,
 1659: 
 1660:     %% Verify that '{nodeup, Node}' comes before '{NodeMsg, 1}' (the message
 1661:     %% bringing up the connection).
 1662:     {nodeup, Node} = receive Msg1 -> Msg1 end,
 1663:     {NodeMsg, N}   = receive Msg2 -> Msg2 end,
 1664:     %% msg stream has begun, kill the node
 1665:     RemotePid ! {self(), kill_it},
 1666: 
 1667:     %% Verify that '{nodedown, Node}' comes after the last '{NodeMsg, N}'
 1668:     %% message.
 1669:     {nodedown, Node} = flush_node_msgs(NodeMsg, N+1),
 1670:     no_msgs(500),
 1671: 
 1672:     Mon = erlang:monitor(process, MN),
 1673:     unlink(MN),
 1674:     exit(MN, bang),
 1675:     receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, MN, bang} -> ok end,
 1676:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1677:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1678:     ok.
 1679: 
 1680: flush_node_msgs(NodeMsg, No) ->
 1681:     case receive Msg -> Msg end of
 1682: 	{NodeMsg, N} when N >= No ->
 1683: 	    flush_node_msgs(NodeMsg, N+1);
 1684: 	OtherMsg ->
 1685: 	    OtherMsg
 1686:     end.
 1687: 
 1688: node_loop_send(Pid, Msg, No) ->
 1689:     Pid ! {Msg, No},
 1690:     node_loop_send(Pid, Msg, No + 1).
 1691: 
 1692: monitor_nodes_errors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1693:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1694:     error = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(asdf),
 1695:     {error,
 1696:      {unknown_options,
 1697:       [gurka]}} = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1698: 					   [gurka]),
 1699:     {error,
 1700:      {unknown_options,
 1701:       #{gurka := true}}} = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1702:                                                     #{gurka => true}),
 1703:     {error,
 1704:      {invalid_options,
 1705:       gurka}} = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1706: 					 gurka),
 1707:     {error,
 1708:      {option_value_mismatch,
 1709:       [{node_type,visible},
 1710:        {node_type,hidden}]}}
 1711: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1712: 				   [{node_type,hidden},
 1713: 				    {node_type,visible}]),
 1714:     {error,
 1715:      {option_value_mismatch,
 1716:       [{node_type,visible},
 1717:        {node_type,all}]}}
 1718: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1719: 				   [{node_type,all},
 1720: 				    {node_type,visible}]),
 1721:     {error,
 1722:      {bad_option_value,
 1723:       {node_type,
 1724:        blaha}}}
 1725: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, blaha}]),
 1726:     {error,
 1727:      {bad_option_value,
 1728:       #{node_type := blaha}}}
 1729: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, #{node_type => blaha}),
 1730:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1731:     ok.
 1732: 
 1733: monitor_nodes_combinations(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1734:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_combinations/2, Config).
 1735: 
 1736: monitor_nodes_combinations(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1737:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1738:     monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1739:     [VisibleName, HiddenName] = get_nodenames(2,
 1740: 					      monitor_nodes_combinations),
 1741:     {ok, Visible} = start_node(DCfg, VisibleName, ""),
 1742:     receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(visible, Visible),
 1743:     no_msgs(),
 1744:     stop_node(Visible),
 1745:     receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(visible, Visible, connection_closed),
 1746:     no_msgs(),
 1747:     {ok, Hidden} = start_node(DCfg, HiddenName, "-hidden"),
 1748:     receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(hidden, Hidden),
 1749:     no_msgs(),
 1750:     stop_node(Hidden),
 1751:     receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(hidden, Hidden, connection_closed),
 1752:     no_msgs(),
 1753:     monitor_nodes_all_comb(false),
 1754:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1755:     no_msgs(),
 1756:     ok.
 1757: 
 1758: monitor_nodes_all_comb(Flag) ->
 1759:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag),
 1760:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1761: 				  [nodedown_reason]),
 1762:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1763: 				  [{node_type, hidden}]),
 1764:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1765: 				  [{node_type, visible}]),
 1766:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1767: 				  [{node_type, all}]),
 1768:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1769: 				  [nodedown_reason,
 1770: 				   {node_type, hidden}]),
 1771:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1772: 				  [nodedown_reason,
 1773: 				   {node_type, visible}]),
 1774:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1775: 				  [nodedown_reason,
 1776: 				   {node_type, all}]),
 1777:     %% There currently are 8 different combinations
 1778:     8.
 1779: 
 1780: 
 1781: receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(visible, Node) ->
 1782:     io:format("Receive nodeup visible...~n"),
 1783:     Exp = [{nodeup, Node},
 1784: 	   {nodeup, Node, []}]
 1785: 	++ mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodeup_msgs_common(visible, Node),
 1786:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1787:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1788:     ok;
 1789: receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(hidden, Node) ->
 1790:     io:format("Receive nodeup hidden...~n"),
 1791:     Exp = mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodeup_msgs_common(hidden, Node),
 1792:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1793:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1794:     ok.
 1795: 
 1796: mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodeup_msgs_common(Type, Node) ->
 1797:     InfoNt = [{node_type, Type}],
 1798:     [{nodeup, Node, InfoNt},
 1799:      {nodeup, Node, InfoNt},
 1800:      {nodeup, Node, InfoNt},
 1801:      {nodeup, Node, InfoNt}].
 1802: 
 1803: receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(visible, Node, Reason) ->
 1804:     io:format("Receive nodedown visible...~n"),
 1805:     Exp = [{nodedown, Node},
 1806: 	   {nodedown, Node, [{nodedown_reason, Reason}]}]
 1807: 	++ mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodedown_msgs_common(visible,
 1808: 						   Node,
 1809: 						   Reason),
 1810:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1811:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1812:     ok;
 1813: receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(hidden, Node, Reason) ->
 1814:     io:format("Receive nodedown hidden...~n"),
 1815:     Exp = mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodedown_msgs_common(hidden, Node, Reason),
 1816:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1817:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1818:     ok.
 1819: 
 1820: mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodedown_msgs_common(Type, Node, Reason) ->
 1821:     InfoNt = [{node_type, Type}],
 1822:     InfoNdrNt = lists:sort([{nodedown_reason, Reason}]++InfoNt),
 1823:     [{nodedown, Node, InfoNt},
 1824:      {nodedown, Node, InfoNt},
 1825:      {nodedown, Node, InfoNdrNt},
 1826:      {nodedown, Node, InfoNdrNt}].
 1827: 
 1828: receive_mn_msgs([]) ->
 1829:     ok;
 1830: receive_mn_msgs(Msgs) ->
 1831:     io:format("Expecting msgs: ~p~n", [Msgs]),
 1832:     receive
 1833: 	{_Dir, _Node} = Msg ->
 1834: 	    io:format("received ~p~n", [Msg]),
 1835: 	    case lists:member(Msg, Msgs) of
 1836: 		true -> receive_mn_msgs(lists:delete(Msg, Msgs));
 1837: 		false -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg,
 1838: 				  expected_messages, Msgs})
 1839: 	    end;
 1840: 	{Dir, Node, Info} ->
 1841: 	    Msg = {Dir, Node, lists:sort(Info)},
 1842: 	    io:format("received ~p~n", [Msg]),
 1843: 	    case lists:member(Msg, Msgs) of
 1844: 		true -> receive_mn_msgs(lists:delete(Msg, Msgs));
 1845: 		false -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg,
 1846: 				  expected_messages, Msgs})
 1847: 	    end;
 1848: 	Msg ->
 1849: 	    io:format("received ~p~n", [Msg]),
 1850: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg,
 1851: 		     expected_messages, Msgs})
 1852:     end.
 1853: 
 1854: monitor_nodes_cleanup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1855:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1856:     Me = self(),
 1857:     No = monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1858:     Inf = spawn(fun () ->
 1859: 			monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1860: 			Me ! {mons_set, self()},
 1861: 			receive after infinity -> ok end
 1862: 		end),
 1863:     TO = spawn(fun () ->
 1864: 		       monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1865: 		       Me ! {mons_set, self()},
 1866: 		       receive after 500 -> ok end
 1867: 	       end),
 1868:     receive {mons_set, Inf} -> ok end,
 1869:     receive {mons_set, TO} -> ok end,
 1870:     MNLen = length(MonNodeState) + No*3,
 1871:     MNLen = length(monitor_node_state()),
 1872:     MonInf = erlang:monitor(process, Inf),
 1873:     MonTO = erlang:monitor(process, TO),
 1874:     exit(Inf, bang),
 1875:     No = monitor_nodes_all_comb(false),
 1876:     receive {'DOWN', MonInf, process, Inf, bang} -> ok end,
 1877:     receive {'DOWN', MonTO, process, TO, normal} -> ok end,
 1878:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1879:     no_msgs(),
 1880:     ok.
 1881: 
 1882: monitor_nodes_many(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1883:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_many/2, Config).
 1884: 
 1885: monitor_nodes_many(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1886:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1887:     [Name] = get_nodenames(1, monitor_nodes_many),
 1888:     %% We want to perform more than 2^16 net_kernel:monitor_nodes
 1889:     %% since this will wrap an internal counter
 1890:     No = (1 bsl 16) + 17,
 1891:     repeat(fun () -> ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true) end, No),
 1892:     No = length(monitor_node_state()) - length(MonNodeState),
 1893:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name),
 1894:     repeat(fun () -> receive {nodeup, Node} -> ok end end, No),
 1895:     stop_node(Node),
 1896:     repeat(fun () -> receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end end, No),
 1897:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1898:     no_msgs(10),
 1899:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1900:     ok.
 1901: 
 1902: %% Test order of messages nodedown and nodeup.
 1903: monitor_nodes_down_up(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1904:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 1905:     true = net_kernel:connect_node(Node),
 1906:     monitor_nodes_yoyo(Node),
 1907:     peer:stop(Peer).
 1908: 
 1909: monitor_nodes_yoyo(A) ->
 1910:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1911:     Papa = self(),
 1912: 
 1913:     %% Spawn lots of processes doing one erlang:monitor_node(A,true) each
 1914:     %% just to get lots of other monitors to fire when connection goes down
 1915:     %% and thereby give time for {nodeup,A} to race before {nodedown,A}.
 1916:     NodeMonCnt = 10000,
 1917:     NodeMons = [my_spawn_opt(fun F() ->
 1918:                                      monitor_node = receive_any(),
 1919:                                      monitor_node(A, true),
 1920:                                      Papa ! ready,
 1921:                                      {nodedown, A} =  receive_any(),
 1922:                                      F()
 1923:                              end,
 1924:                              [link, monitor, {priority, low}])
 1925:                 ||
 1926:                    _ <- lists:seq(1, NodeMonCnt)],
 1927: 
 1928:     %% Spawn message spamming process to trigger new connection setups
 1929:     %% as quick as possible.
 1930:     Spammer = my_spawn_opt(fun F() ->
 1931:                                    {dummy, A} ! trigger_auto_connect,
 1932:                                    F()
 1933:                            end,
 1934:                            [link, monitor]),
 1935: 
 1936:     %% Now bring connection down and verify we get {nodedown,A} before {nodeup,A}.
 1937:     Yoyos = 20,
 1938:     [begin
 1939:          [P ! monitor_node || P <- NodeMons],
 1940:          [receive ready -> ok end || _ <- NodeMons],
 1941: 
 1942:          Owner = get_conn_owner(A),
 1943:          exit(Owner, kill),
 1944: 
 1945:          {nodedown, A} = receive_any(),
 1946:          {nodeup, A} = receive_any()
 1947:      end
 1948:      || _ <- lists:seq(1,Yoyos)],
 1949: 
 1950:     unlink(Spammer),
 1951:     exit(Spammer, die),
 1952:     receive {'DOWN',_,process,Spammer,_} -> ok end,
 1953: 
 1954:     [begin unlink(P), exit(P, die) end || P <- NodeMons],
 1955:     [receive {'DOWN',_,process,P,_} -> ok end || P <- NodeMons],
 1956: 
 1957:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1958:     ok.
 1959: 
 1960: receive_any() ->
 1961:     receive_any(infinity).
 1962: 
 1963: receive_any(Timeout) ->
 1964:     receive
 1965:         M -> M
 1966:     after
 1967:         Timeout -> timeout
 1968:     end.
 1969: 
 1970: my_spawn_opt(Fun, Opts) ->
 1971:     case spawn_opt(Fun, Opts) of
 1972:         {Pid, _Mref} -> Pid;
 1973:         Pid -> Pid
 1974:     end.
 1975: 
 1976: get_conn_owner(Node) ->
 1977:     {ok, NodeInfo} = net_kernel:node_info(Node),
 1978:     {value,{owner, Owner}} = lists:keysearch(owner, 1, NodeInfo),
 1979:     Owner.
 1980: 
 1981: dist_ctrl_proc_smoke(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1982:     dist_ctrl_proc_test(get_nodenames(2, ?FUNCTION_NAME)).
 1983: 
 1984: dist_ctrl_proc_reject(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1985:     ToReject = combinations(dist_util:rejectable_flags()),
 1986:     lists:map(fun(Flags) ->
 1987:                       ct:log("Try to reject ~p",[Flags]),
 1988:                       dist_ctrl_proc_test(get_nodenames(2, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
 1989:                         "-gen_tcp_dist_reject_flags " ++ integer_to_list(Flags))
 1990:               end, ToReject).
 1991: 
 1992: combinations([H | T]) ->
 1993:     lists:flatten([[(1 bsl H) bor C || C <- combinations(T)] | combinations(T)]);
 1994: combinations([]) ->
 1995:     [0];
 1996: combinations(BitField) ->
 1997:     lists:sort(combinations(bits(BitField, 0))).
 1998: 
 1999: bits(0, _) ->
 2000:     [];
 2001: bits(BitField, Cnt) when BitField band 1 == 1 ->
 2002:     [Cnt | bits(BitField bsr 1, Cnt + 1)];
 2003: bits(BitField, Cnt) ->
 2004:     bits(BitField bsr 1, Cnt + 1).
 2005: 
 2006: dist_ctrl_proc_test(Nodes) ->
 2007:     dist_ctrl_proc_test(Nodes,"").
 2008: 
 2009: dist_ctrl_proc_test([Name1,Name2], Extra) ->
 2010:     ThisNode = node(),
 2011:     GenTcpOptProlog = "-proto_dist gen_tcp "
 2012:         "-gen_tcp_dist_output_loop " ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " " ++
 2013:         "dist_cntrlr_output_test_size " ++ Extra,
 2014:     {ok, Node1} = start_node("", Name1, "-proto_dist gen_tcp"),
 2015:     {ok, Node2} = start_node("", Name2, GenTcpOptProlog),
 2016:     NL = lists:sort([ThisNode, Node1, Node2]),
 2017:     wait_until(fun () ->
 2018:                        NL == lists:sort([node()|nodes()])
 2019:                end),
 2020:     wait_until(fun () ->
 2021:                        NL == lists:sort([rpc:call(Node1,erlang, node, [])
 2022:                                          | rpc:call(Node1, erlang, nodes, [])])
 2023:                end),
 2024:     wait_until(fun () ->
 2025:                        NL == lists:sort([rpc:call(Node2,erlang, node, [])
 2026:                                          | rpc:call(Node2, erlang, nodes, [])])
 2027:                end),
 2028: 
 2029:     smoke_communicate(Node1, gen_tcp_dist, dist_cntrlr_output_loop),
 2030:     smoke_communicate(Node2, erl_distribution_SUITE, dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size),
 2031: 
 2032:     stop_node(Node1),
 2033:     stop_node(Node2),
 2034:     ok.
 2035: 
 2036: smoke_communicate(Node, OLoopMod, OLoopFun) ->
 2037:     %% Verify that we actually are executing the distribution
 2038:     %% module we expect and also massage message passing over
 2039:     %% the connection a bit...
 2040:     Ps = rpc:call(Node, erlang, processes, []),
 2041:     try
 2042:         lists:foreach(
 2043:           fun (P) ->
 2044:                   case rpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [P, current_stacktrace]) of
 2045:                       undefined ->
 2046:                           ok;
 2047:                       {current_stacktrace, StkTrace} ->
 2048:                           lists:foreach(fun ({Mod, Fun, 2, _}) when Mod == OLoopMod,
 2049:                                                                     Fun == OLoopFun ->
 2050:                                                 io:format("~p ~p~n", [P, StkTrace]),
 2051:                                                 throw(found_it);
 2052:                                             (_) ->
 2053:                                                 ok
 2054:                                         end, StkTrace)
 2055:                   end
 2056:           end, Ps),
 2057:         exit({missing, {OLoopMod, OLoopFun}})
 2058:     catch
 2059:         throw:found_it -> ok
 2060:     end,
 2061:     Bin = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1000,100)),
 2062:     BitStr = <<0:7999>>,
 2063:     List = [[Bin], atom, [BitStr|Bin], make_ref(), [[[BitStr|"hopp"]]],
 2064:             4711, 111122222211111111111111,"hej", fun () -> ok end, BitStr,
 2065:             self(), fun erlang:node/1],
 2066:     Pid = spawn_link(Node, fun () -> receive {From1, Msg1} -> From1 ! Msg1 end,
 2067:                                      receive {From2, Msg2} -> From2 ! Msg2 end
 2068:                            end),
 2069:     R = make_ref(),
 2070:     Pid ! {self(), [R, List]},
 2071:     receive [R, L1] -> List = L1 end,
 2072: 
 2073:     %% Send a huge message in order to trigger message fragmentation if enabled
 2074:     FragBin = <<0:(2*(1024*64*8))>>,
 2075:     Pid ! {self(), [R, List, FragBin]},
 2076:     receive [R, L2, B] -> List = L2, FragBin = B end,
 2077: 
 2078:     unlink(Pid),
 2079:     exit(Pid, kill),
 2080:     ok.
 2081: 
 2082: 
 2083: erl_uds_dist_smoke_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2084:     case os:type() of
 2085:         {win32,_} ->
 2086:             {skipped, "Not on Windows"};
 2087:         _ ->
 2088:             do_erl_uds_dist_smoke_test()
 2089:     end.
 2090: 
 2091: do_erl_uds_dist_smoke_test() ->
 2092:     [Node1, Node2] = lists:map(fun (Name) ->
 2093:                                        list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Name) ++ "@localhost")
 2094:                                end,
 2095:                                get_nodenames(2, erl_uds_dist_smoke_test)),
 2096:     {LPort, Acceptor} = uds_listen(),
 2097:     start_uds_node(Node1, LPort),
 2098:     start_uds_node(Node2, LPort),
 2099:     receive
 2100:         {uds_nodeup, N1} ->
 2101:             io:format("~p is up~n", [N1])
 2102:     end,
 2103:     receive
 2104:         {uds_nodeup, N2} ->
 2105:             io:format("~p is up~n", [N2])
 2106:     end,
 2107:     
 2108:     io:format("Testing ping net_adm:ping(~p) on ~p~n", [Node2, Node1]),
 2109:     Node1 ! {self(), {net_adm, ping, [Node2]}},
 2110:     receive
 2111:         {Node1, PingRes} ->
 2112:             io:format("~p~n", [PingRes]),
 2113:             pong = PingRes
 2114:     end,
 2115: 
 2116:     io:format("Testing nodes() on ~p~n", [Node1]),
 2117:     Node1 ! {self(), {erlang, nodes, []}},
 2118:     receive
 2119:         {Node1, N1List} ->
 2120:             io:format("~p~n", [N1List]),
 2121:             [Node2] = N1List
 2122:     end,
 2123: 
 2124:     io:format("Testing nodes() on ~p~n", [Node2]),
 2125:     Node2 ! {self(), {erlang, nodes, []}},
 2126:     receive
 2127:         {Node2, N2List} ->
 2128:             io:format("~p~n", [N2List]),
 2129:             [Node1] = N2List
 2130:     end,
 2131: 
 2132:     io:format("Shutting down~n", []),
 2133: 
 2134:     Node1 ! {self(), close},
 2135:     Node2 ! {self(), close},
 2136: 
 2137:     receive {Node1, C1} -> ok = C1 end,
 2138:     receive {Node2, C2} -> ok = C2 end,
 2139: 
 2140:     unlink(Acceptor),
 2141:     exit(Acceptor, kill),
 2142: 
 2143:     io:format("ok~n", []),
 2144: 
 2145:     ok.
 2146: 
 2147: %% Helpers for testing the erl_uds_dist example
 2148: 
 2149: uds_listen() ->
 2150:     Me = self(),
 2151:     {ok, LSock} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [binary, {packet, 4}, {active, false}]),
 2152:     {ok, LPort} = inet:port(LSock),
 2153:     {LPort, spawn_link(fun () ->
 2154:                                uds_accept_loop(LSock, Me)
 2155:                        end)}.
 2156: 
 2157: uds_accept_loop(LSock, TestProc) ->
 2158:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
 2159:     _ = spawn_link(fun () ->
 2160:                            uds_rpc_client_init(Sock, TestProc)
 2161:                    end),
 2162:     uds_accept_loop(LSock, TestProc).
 2163: 
 2164: uds_rpc(Sock, MFA) ->
 2165:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(MFA)),
 2166:     case gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0) of
 2167:         {error, Reason} ->
 2168:             error({recv_failed, Reason});
 2169:         {ok, Packet} ->
 2170:             binary_to_term(Packet)
 2171:     end.
 2172: 
 2173: uds_rpc_client_init(Sock, TestProc) ->
 2174:     case uds_rpc(Sock, {erlang, node, []}) of
 2175:         nonode@nohost ->
 2176:             %% Wait for distribution to come up...
 2177:             receive after 100 -> ok end,
 2178:             uds_rpc_client_init(Sock, TestProc);
 2179:         Node when is_atom(Node) ->
 2180:             register(Node, self()),
 2181:             TestProc ! {uds_nodeup, Node},
 2182:             uds_rpc_client_loop(Sock, Node)
 2183:     end.
 2184: 
 2185: uds_rpc_client_loop(Sock, Node) ->
 2186:     receive
 2187:         {From, close} ->
 2188:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(close)),
 2189:             From ! {Node, gen_tcp:close(Sock)},
 2190:             exit(normal);
 2191:         {From, ApplyData} ->
 2192:             From ! {Node, uds_rpc(Sock, ApplyData)},
 2193:             uds_rpc_client_loop(Sock, Node)
 2194:     end.
 2195: 
 2196: uds_rpc_server_loop(Sock) ->
 2197:     case gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0) of
 2198:         {error, Reason} ->
 2199:             error({recv_failed, Reason});
 2200:         {ok, Packet} ->
 2201:             case binary_to_term(Packet) of
 2202:                 {M, F, A} when is_atom(M), is_atom(F), is_list(A) ->
 2203:                     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(apply(M, F, A)));
 2204:                 {F, A} when is_function(F), is_list(A) ->
 2205:                     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(apply(F, A)));
 2206:                 close ->
 2207:                     ok = gen_tcp:close(Sock),
 2208:                     exit(normal);
 2209:                 Other ->
 2210:                     error({unexpected_data, Other})
 2211:             end
 2212:     end,
 2213:     uds_rpc_server_loop(Sock).
 2214: 
 2215: start_uds_rpc_server([PortString]) ->
 2216:     Port = list_to_integer(PortString),
 2217:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 2218:                                        {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect({127,0,0,1}, Port,
 2219:                                                                     [binary, {packet, 4},
 2220:                                                                      {active, false}]),
 2221:                                        uds_rpc_server_loop(Sock)
 2222:                                end),
 2223:     receive
 2224:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 2225:             if Reason == normal ->
 2226:                     halt();
 2227:                true ->
 2228:                     EStr = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("uds rpc server crashed: ~p", [Reason])),
 2229:                     (catch file:write_file("uds_rpc_server_crash."++os:getpid(), EStr)),
 2230:                     halt(EStr)
 2231:             end
 2232:     end.
 2233: 
 2234: start_uds_node(NodeName, LPort) ->
 2235:     Static = "-detached -noinput -proto_dist erl_uds",
 2236:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 2237:     Prog = case catch init:get_argument(progname) of
 2238: 	       {ok,[[P]]} -> P;
 2239: 	       _ -> error(no_progname_argument_found)
 2240: 	   end,
 2241:     {ok, Pwd} = file:get_cwd(),
 2242:     NameStr = atom_to_list(NodeName),
 2243:     CmdLine = Prog ++ " "
 2244: 	++ Static
 2245: 	++ " -sname " ++ NameStr
 2246: 	++ " -pa " ++ Pa
 2247: 	++ " -env ERL_CRASH_DUMP " ++ Pwd ++ "/erl_crash_dump." ++ NameStr
 2248: 	++ " -setcookie " ++ atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie())
 2249:         ++ " -run " ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " start_uds_rpc_server "
 2250:         ++ integer_to_list(LPort),
 2251:     io:format("Starting: ~p~n", [CmdLine]),
 2252:     case open_port({spawn, CmdLine}, []) of
 2253: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
 2254: 	    unlink(Port),
 2255: 	    erlang:port_close(Port);
 2256: 	Error ->
 2257: 	    error({open_port_failed, Error})
 2258:     end,
 2259:     ok.
 2260: 
 2261: erl_1424(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2262:     {error, Reason} = erl_epmd:names("."),
 2263:     {comment, lists:flatten(io_lib:format("Reason: ~p", [Reason]))}.
 2264: 
 2265: net_kernel_start(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2266:     MyName = net_kernel_start_tester,
 2267:     register(MyName, self()),
 2268:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, 120, 8, true, false),
 2269:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, 120, 8, false, false),
 2270:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, 120, 8, true, true),
 2271:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, undefined, undefined, undefined, undefined).
 2272: 
 2273: net_kernel_start_test(MyName, NetTickTime, NetTickIntesity, DistListen, Hidden) ->
 2274:     TestNameStr = "net_kernel_start_test_node-"
 2275:         ++ integer_to_list(erlang:system_time(seconds))
 2276:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:unique_integer([monotonic,positive])),
 2277:     TestNode = list_to_atom(TestNameStr ++ "@" ++ atom_to_list(gethostname())),
 2278:     CmdLine = net_kernel_start_cmdline(MyName, list_to_atom(TestNameStr),
 2279:                                        NetTickTime, NetTickIntesity, DistListen, Hidden),
 2280:     io:format("Starting test node ~p: ~s~n", [TestNode, CmdLine]),
 2281:     case open_port({spawn, CmdLine}, []) of
 2282: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
 2283:             case DistListen == false of
 2284:                 false ->
 2285:                     ok;
 2286:                 true ->
 2287:                     receive after 1500 -> ok end,
 2288:                     pang = net_adm:ping(TestNode),
 2289:                     ok
 2290:             end,
 2291:             receive
 2292:                 {i_am_alive, Pid, Node, NTT} = Msg ->
 2293:                     IsHidden = lists:member(TestNode, nodes(hidden)),
 2294:                     IsVisible = lists:member(TestNode, nodes(visible)),
 2295:                     io:format("IsVisible = ~p~nIsHidden = ~p~n", [IsVisible, IsHidden]),
 2296:                     io:format("Response from ~p: ~p~n", [Node, Msg]),
 2297:                     rpc:cast(Node, erlang, halt, []),
 2298:                     catch erlang:port_close(Port),
 2299:                     TestNode = node(Pid),
 2300:                     TestNode = Node,
 2301:                     case NetTickTime == undefined of
 2302:                         true ->
 2303:                             {ok, DefNTT} = application:get_env(kernel, net_ticktime),
 2304:                             DefNTT = NTT;
 2305:                         false ->
 2306:                             NetTickTime = NTT
 2307:                     end,
 2308:                     case DistListen == false orelse Hidden == true of
 2309:                         true ->
 2310:                             true = IsHidden,
 2311:                             false = IsVisible;
 2312:                         false ->
 2313:                             false = IsHidden,
 2314:                             true = IsVisible
 2315:                     end
 2316:             end,
 2317:             ok;
 2318: 	Error ->
 2319: 	    error({open_port_failed, TestNode, Error})
 2320:     end.
 2321: 
 2322: net_kernel_start_cmdline(TestName, Name, NetTickTime, NetTickIntensity, DistListen, Hidden) ->
 2323:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 2324:     Prog = case catch init:get_argument(progname) of
 2325: 	       {ok, [[Prg]]} -> Prg;
 2326: 	       _ -> error(missing_progname)
 2327: 	   end,
 2328:     NameDomain = case net_kernel:longnames() of
 2329:                      false -> "shortnames";
 2330:                      true -> "longnames"
 2331:                  end,
 2332:     {ok, Pwd} = file:get_cwd(),
 2333:     NameStr = atom_to_list(Name),
 2334:     Prog ++ " -noinput -noshell -detached -pa " ++ Pa
 2335: 	++ " -env ERL_CRASH_DUMP " ++ Pwd ++ "/erl_crash_dump." ++ NameStr
 2336: 	++ " -setcookie " ++ atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie())
 2337: 	++ " -run " ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " net_kernel_start_do_test "
 2338: 	++ atom_to_list(TestName) ++ " " ++ atom_to_list(node()) ++ " "
 2339:         ++ NameStr ++ " " ++ NameDomain
 2340:         ++ case NetTickTime == undefined of
 2341:                true ->
 2342:                    "";
 2343:                false ->
 2344:                    " " ++ integer_to_list(NetTickTime) ++
 2345:                        " " ++ integer_to_list(NetTickIntensity)
 2346:            end
 2347:         ++ case DistListen == undefined of
 2348:                true -> "";
 2349:                false -> " " ++ atom_to_list(DistListen)
 2350:            end
 2351:         ++ case Hidden == undefined of
 2352:                true -> "";
 2353:                false -> " " ++ atom_to_list(Hidden)
 2354:            end.
 2355: 
 2356: net_kernel_start_do_test([TestName, TestNode, Name, NameDomain]) ->
 2357:     net_kernel_start_do_test(TestName, TestNode, list_to_atom(Name),
 2358:                              #{name_domain => list_to_atom(NameDomain)});
 2359: 
 2360: net_kernel_start_do_test([TestName, TestNode, Name, NameDomain, NetTickTime, NetTickIntensity,
 2361:                           DistListen, Hidden]) ->
 2362:     net_kernel_start_do_test(TestName, TestNode, list_to_atom(Name),
 2363:                              #{net_ticktime => list_to_integer(NetTickTime),
 2364:                                name_domain => list_to_atom(NameDomain),
 2365:                                net_tickintensity => list_to_integer(NetTickIntensity),
 2366:                                dist_listen => list_to_atom(DistListen),
 2367:                                hidden => list_to_atom(Hidden)}).
 2368: 
 2369: net_kernel_start_do_test(TestName, TestNode, Name, Options) ->
 2370:     case net_kernel:start(Name, Options) of
 2371:         {ok, _Pid} ->
 2372:             case maps:get(dist_listen, Options, true) of
 2373:                 false -> receive after 3000 -> ok end;
 2374:                 true -> ok
 2375:             end,
 2376:             Tester = {list_to_atom(TestName), list_to_atom(TestNode)},
 2377:             Tester ! {i_am_alive, self(), node(), net_kernel:get_net_ticktime()},
 2378:             receive after 60000 -> ok end,
 2379:             erlang:halt();
 2380:         Error ->
 2381:             erlang:halt(lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~p", [Error])))
 2382:     end.
 2383: 
 2384: differing_cookies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2385:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2386:     Node = node(),
 2387:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2388:     [] = nodes(),
 2389:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2390: 
 2391:     %% Use -hidden nodes to avoid global connecting all nodes
 2392: 
 2393:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2394:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2395:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2396:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2397:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2398:     true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeA, NodeACookie ),
 2399:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2400:         start_node( "-hidden", NodeAName, "-setcookie "++NodeACookieL ),
 2401:     try
 2402: 
 2403:         %% Verify the cluster
 2404:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(hidden),
 2405:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2406: 
 2407:         %% Start node B with another different cookie
 2408:         NodeBName = BaseName++"_nodeB",
 2409:         NodeB = full_node_name(NodeBName),
 2410:         NodeBCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieB",
 2411:         NodeBCookie = list_to_atom(NodeBCookieL),
 2412:         true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeB, NodeBCookie ),
 2413:         { ok, NodeB } =
 2414:             start_node( "-hidden", NodeBName, "-setcookie "++NodeBCookieL ),
 2415:         try
 2416: 
 2417:             %% Verify the cluster
 2418:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2419:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2420:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2421: 
 2422:             %% Verify that the nodes can not connect
 2423:             %% before correcting the cookie configuration
 2424:             pang = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2425:             pang = rpc:call( NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA] ),
 2426: 
 2427:             %% Configure cookie and connect node A -> B
 2428:             true = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, set_cookie, [NodeB, NodeBCookie] ),
 2429:             pong = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2430: 
 2431:             %% Verify the cluster
 2432:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2433:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2434:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2435:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2436:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2437:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2438:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2439: 
 2440:             %% Disconnect node A from B
 2441:             true = rpc:call( NodeB, net_kernel, disconnect, [NodeA] ),
 2442: 
 2443:             %% Verify the cluster
 2444:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2445:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2446:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2447: 
 2448:             %% Reconnect, now node B -> A
 2449:             pong = rpc:call( NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA] ),
 2450: 
 2451:             %% Verify the cluster
 2452:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2453:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2454:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2455:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2456:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ))
 2457: 
 2458:         after
 2459:             _ = stop_node(NodeB)
 2460:         end
 2461:     after
 2462:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2463:     end,
 2464:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2465:     ok.
 2466: 
 2467: cmdline_setcookie_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2468:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2469:     Node = node(),
 2470:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2471:     [] = nodes(),
 2472:     NodeL = atom_to_list(Node),
 2473:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2474:     NodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(),
 2475:     NodeCookieL = atom_to_list(NodeCookie),
 2476: 
 2477:     %% Use -hidden nodes to avoid global connecting all nodes
 2478: 
 2479:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2480:     %% and cookie configuration of mother node
 2481:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2482:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2483:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2484:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2485:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2486:         start_node(
 2487:           "-hidden", NodeAName,
 2488:           "-setcookie "++NodeL++" "++NodeCookieL ),
 2489: 
 2490:     try
 2491: 
 2492:         %% Verify the cluster
 2493:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(hidden),
 2494:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2495:         NodeCookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2496: 
 2497:         true = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, set_cookie, [NodeACookie] ),
 2498: 
 2499:         %% Start node B with different cookie
 2500:         %% and cookie configuration of mother node and node A
 2501:         NodeBName = BaseName++"_nodeB",
 2502:         NodeB = full_node_name(NodeBName),
 2503:         NodeBCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieB",
 2504:         NodeBCookie = list_to_atom(NodeBCookieL),
 2505:         { ok, NodeB } =
 2506:             start_node(
 2507:               "-hidden", NodeBName,
 2508:               "-setcookie "++NodeBCookieL++" "
 2509:               "-setcookie "++NodeL++" "++NodeCookieL++" "
 2510:               "-setcookie "++atom_to_list(NodeA)++" "++NodeACookieL ),
 2511: 
 2512:         try
 2513: 
 2514:             %% Verify the cluster
 2515:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2516:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2517:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2518:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2519:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2520: 
 2521:             %% Connect the nodes
 2522:             pong = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2523: 
 2524:             %% Verify the cluster
 2525:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2526:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2527:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2528:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2529:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2530:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2531:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ))
 2532: 
 2533:         after
 2534:             _ = stop_node(NodeB)
 2535:         end
 2536:     after
 2537:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2538:     end,
 2539:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2540:     ok.
 2541: 
 2542: connection_cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2543:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2544:     Node = node(),
 2545:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2546:     [] = nodes(),
 2547:     NodeL = atom_to_list(Node),
 2548:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2549: 
 2550:     %% Start node A with dedicated connection cookie
 2551:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2552:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2553:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2554:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2555:     true = NodeACookie =/= erlang:get_cookie(),
 2556:     ConnectionCookieL = BaseName++"_connectionCookie",
 2557:     ConnectionCookie = list_to_atom(ConnectionCookieL),
 2558:     true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeA, ConnectionCookie ),
 2559:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2560:         start_node(
 2561:           "", NodeAName,
 2562:           "-setcookie "++NodeACookieL++" "
 2563:           "-setcookie "++NodeL++" "++ConnectionCookieL ),
 2564: 
 2565:     try
 2566: 
 2567:         %% Verify the cluster
 2568:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(),
 2569:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [] ),
 2570:         NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2571:         ConnectionCookie = rpc:call( NodeA, auth, get_cookie, [Node]),
 2572:         ConnectionCookie = erlang:get_cookie( NodeA )
 2573: 
 2574:     after
 2575:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2576:     end,
 2577:     [] = nodes(),
 2578:     ok.
 2579: 
 2580: dyn_differing_cookies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2581:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2582:     MotherNode = node(),
 2583:     true = MotherNode =/= nonode@nohost,
 2584:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2585:     MotherNodeL = atom_to_list(MotherNode),
 2586:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2587:     MotherNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(),
 2588:     MotherNodeCookieL = atom_to_list(MotherNodeCookie),
 2589:     register(?FUNCTION_NAME, self()),
 2590: 
 2591:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2592:     %% and cookie configuration of mother node
 2593:     DynNodeCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2594:     DynNodeCookie = list_to_atom(DynNodeCookieL),
 2595:     {_NF1, Port1} =
 2596:         start_node_unconnected(
 2597:           "-setcookie "++MotherNodeL++" "++MotherNodeCookieL,
 2598:           undefined, DynNodeCookie,
 2599:           ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
 2600:           ["ddc_remote_run", MotherNodeL, "cmdline", MotherNodeCookieL] ),
 2601: 
 2602:     dyn_differing_cookies(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port1),
 2603: 
 2604:     %% Same again, but use erlang:set_cookie/2 to set MotherNodeCookie
 2605:     {_NF2, Port2} =
 2606:         start_node_unconnected(
 2607:           "",
 2608:           undefined, DynNodeCookie,
 2609:           ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
 2610:           ["ddc_remote_run", MotherNodeL, "set_cookie", MotherNodeCookieL] ),
 2611: 
 2612:     dyn_differing_cookies(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port2).
 2613: 
 2614: 
 2615: dyn_differing_cookies(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port) ->
 2616:     receive
 2617:         { MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, DynNode } ->
 2618:             [ DynNode ] = nodes(hidden),
 2619:             [ MotherNode ] = rpc:call( DynNode, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2620:             DynNodeCookie = rpc:call( DynNode, erlang, get_cookie, [] ),
 2621:             MotherNodeCookie =
 2622:                 rpc:call( DynNode, erlang, get_cookie, [MotherNode] ),
 2623:             {ddc_remote_run, DynNode} !
 2624:                 {MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNode},
 2625: 
 2626:             0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port),
 2627: 
 2628:             [] = nodes(hidden),
 2629:             ok;
 2630:         {Port, {data, Data}} ->
 2631:             io:format("~p: ~s", [Port, Data]),
 2632:             dyn_differing_cookies(
 2633:               MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port);
 2634:         Other ->
 2635:             error({unexpected, Other})
 2636:     end.
 2637: 
 2638: ddc_remote_run(MotherNode, [SetCookie, MotherNodeCookieL]) ->
 2639:     nonode@nohost = node(),
 2640:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2641:     MotherNodeCookie = list_to_atom(MotherNodeCookieL),
 2642:     case SetCookie of
 2643:         "set_cookie" ->
 2644:             erlang:set_cookie(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie);
 2645:         "cmdline" ->
 2646:             ok
 2647:     end,
 2648:     MotherNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(MotherNode),
 2649:     true = net_kernel:connect_node( MotherNode ),
 2650:     [ MotherNode ] = nodes(hidden),
 2651:     DynNode = node(),
 2652:     [ DynNode ] = rpc:call( MotherNode, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2653:     MotherNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie( MotherNode ),
 2654:     MotherNodeCookie = rpc:call( MotherNode, erlang, get_cookie, [] ),
 2655:     %% Here we get the mother node's default cookie
 2656:     MotherNodeCookie = rpc:call( MotherNode, erlang, get_cookie, [DynNode] ),
 2657:     DynNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(),
 2658:     register(ddc_remote_run, self() ),
 2659:     {dyn_differing_cookies, MotherNode} !
 2660:         {MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, DynNode},
 2661:     receive
 2662:         { MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNode } ->
 2663:             true = disconnect_node( MotherNode ),
 2664:             [] = nodes(hidden),
 2665:             ok;
 2666:         Other ->
 2667:             error({unexpected, Other})
 2668:     end.
 2669: 
 2670: xdg_cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2671:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2672: 
 2673:     TestHome = filename:join(PrivDir, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2674:     ok = file:make_dir(TestHome),
 2675: 
 2676:     HomeEnv = case os:type() of
 2677:               {win32, _} ->
 2678:                   [Drive | Path] = filename:split(TestHome),
 2679:                   [{"APPDATA", filename:join(TestHome,"AppData")},
 2680:                    {"HOMEDRIVE", Drive}, {"HOMEPATH", filename:join(Path)}];
 2681:               _ ->
 2682:                   [{"HOME", TestHome}]
 2683:           end,
 2684: 
 2685:     NodeOpts = #{ env => HomeEnv ++
 2686:                       [{"ERL_CRASH_DUMP", filename:join([TestHome,"erl_crash.dump"])}],
 2687:                   connection => 0 },
 2688: 
 2689:     %% Test that a default .erlang.cookie file is created
 2690:     {ok, CreatorPeer, _} = peer:start_link(NodeOpts#{ name => peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME) }),
 2691:     UserConfig = peer:call(CreatorPeer, filename, basedir, [user_config,"erlang"]),
 2692:     ?assert(peer:call(CreatorPeer, filelib, is_regular,
 2693:                       [filename:join(TestHome, ".erlang.cookie")])),
 2694:     OrigCookie = peer:call(CreatorPeer, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2695:     peer:stop(CreatorPeer),
 2696: 
 2697:     %% Test that the $HOME/.erlang.cookie file takes precedence over XDG
 2698:     XDGCookie = filename:join([UserConfig, ".erlang.cookie"]),
 2699:     ok = filelib:ensure_dir(XDGCookie),
 2700:     ok = file:write_file(XDGCookie, "Me want cookie!"),
 2701:     {ok, XDGFI} = file:read_file_info(XDGCookie),
 2702:     ok = file:write_file_info(XDGCookie, XDGFI#file_info{ mode = 8#600 }),
 2703: 
 2704:     {ok, Peer, _} = peer:start_link(NodeOpts#{ name => peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME) }),
 2705: 
 2706:     ?assertEqual(OrigCookie, peer:call(Peer, erlang, get_cookie, [])),
 2707: 
 2708:     peer:stop(Peer),
 2709: 
 2710:     %% Check that XDG cookie works after we delete the $HOME cookie
 2711:     HomeCookie = filename:join(TestHome, ".erlang.cookie"),
 2712:     {ok, HomeFI} = file:read_file_info(HomeCookie),
 2713:     ok = file:write_file_info(HomeCookie, HomeFI#file_info{ mode = 8#777 }),
 2714:     ok = file:delete(HomeCookie),
 2715:     {ok, Peer2, _} = peer:start_link(NodeOpts#{ name => peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME) }),
 2716:     ?assertEqual('Me want cookie!', peer:call(Peer2, erlang, get_cookie, [])),
 2717: 
 2718:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 2719: 
 2720:     ok.
 2721: 
 2722: 
 2723: 
 2724: %% Misc. functions
 2725: 
 2726: equal_sets(A, B) ->
 2727:     S = lists:sort(A),
 2728:     case lists:sort(B) of
 2729:         S ->
 2730:             ok;
 2731:         _ ->
 2732:             erlang:error({not_equal_sets, A, B})
 2733:     end.
 2734: 
 2735: run_dist_configs(Func, Config) ->
 2736:     GetOptProlog = "-proto_dist gen_tcp -gen_tcp_dist_output_loop "
 2737:         ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " ",
 2738:     GenTcpDistTest = case get_gen_tcp_dist_test_type() of
 2739:                          default ->
 2740:                              {"gen_tcp_dist", "-proto_dist gen_tcp"};
 2741:                          size ->
 2742:                              {"gen_tcp_dist (get_size)",
 2743:                               GetOptProlog ++ "dist_cntrlr_output_test_size"}
 2744:                      end,
 2745:     lists:map(fun ({DCfgName, DCfg}) ->
 2746:                       io:format("~n~n=== Running ~s configuration ===~n~n",
 2747:                                 [DCfgName]),
 2748:                       Func(DCfg, Config)
 2749:               end,
 2750:               [{"default", ""}, GenTcpDistTest]).
 2751: 
 2752: start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server() ->
 2753:     Me = self(),
 2754:     Go = make_ref(),
 2755:     io:format("STARTING: gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server~n",[]),
 2756:     {P, M} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 2757:                                    register(gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server, self()),
 2758:                                    Me ! Go,
 2759:                                    gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server()
 2760:                            end),
 2761:     receive
 2762:         Go ->
 2763:             ok;
 2764:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, _} ->
 2765:             start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server()
 2766:     end.
 2767: 
 2768: kill_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server() ->
 2769:     case whereis(gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server) of
 2770:         undefined ->
 2771:             ok;
 2772:         Pid ->
 2773:             exit(Pid,kill),
 2774:             %% Sync death, before continuing...
 2775:             false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid)
 2776:     end.
 2777: 
 2778: gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server() ->
 2779:     Type = case abs(erlang:monotonic_time(second)) rem 2 of
 2780:                0 -> default;
 2781:                1 -> size
 2782:            end,
 2783:     gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(Type).
 2784: 
 2785: gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(Type) ->
 2786:     receive
 2787:         {From, Ref} ->
 2788:             From ! {Ref, Type},
 2789:             NewType = case Type of
 2790:                           default -> size;
 2791:                           size -> default
 2792:                       end,
 2793:             gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(NewType)
 2794:     end.
 2795: 
 2796: get_gen_tcp_dist_test_type() ->
 2797:     Ref = make_ref(),
 2798:     try
 2799:         gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server ! {self(), Ref},
 2800:         receive
 2801:             {Ref, Type} ->
 2802:                 Type
 2803:         end
 2804:     catch
 2805:         error:badarg ->
 2806:             start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(),
 2807:             get_gen_tcp_dist_test_type()
 2808:     end.
 2809: 
 2810: dist_cntrlr_output_test_size(DHandle, Socket) ->
 2811:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2812:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_set_opt(DHandle, get_size, true),
 2813:     true = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2814:     true = erlang:dist_ctrl_set_opt(DHandle, get_size, false),
 2815:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2816:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_set_opt(DHandle, get_size, true),
 2817:     true = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2818:     dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size(DHandle, Socket).
 2819: 
 2820: dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size(DHandle, Socket) ->
 2821:     receive
 2822:         dist_data ->
 2823:             %% Outgoing data from this node...
 2824:             dist_cntrlr_send_data_size(DHandle, Socket);
 2825:         _ ->
 2826:             ok %% Drop garbage message...
 2827:     end,
 2828:     dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size(DHandle, Socket).
 2829: 
 2830: dist_cntrlr_send_data_size(DHandle, Socket) ->
 2831:     case erlang:dist_ctrl_get_data(DHandle) of
 2832:         none ->
 2833:             erlang:dist_ctrl_get_data_notification(DHandle);
 2834:         {Size, Data} ->
 2835:             ok = ensure_iovec(Data),
 2836:             Size = erlang:iolist_size(Data),
 2837:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket, Data),
 2838:             dist_cntrlr_send_data_size(DHandle, Socket)
 2839:     end.
 2840: 
 2841: ensure_iovec([]) ->
 2842:     ok;
 2843: ensure_iovec([X|Y]) when is_binary(X) ->
 2844:     ensure_iovec(Y).
 2845: 
 2846: monitor_node_state() ->
 2847:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 2848:     MonitoringNodes = erts_debug:get_internal_state(monitoring_nodes),
 2849:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false),
 2850:     MonitoringNodes.
 2851: 
 2852: 
 2853: check_no_nodedown_nodeup(TimeOut) ->
 2854:     receive
 2855: 	{nodeup, _, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodeup, Msg});
 2856: 	{nodeup, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodeup, Msg});
 2857: 	{nodedown, _, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodedown, Msg});
 2858: 	{nodedown, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodedown, Msg})
 2859:     after TimeOut ->
 2860: 	    ok
 2861:     end.
 2862: 
 2863: print_my_messages() ->
 2864:     {messages, Messages} = process_info(self(), messages),
 2865:     io:format("Messages: ~p~n", [Messages]),
 2866:     ok.
 2867: 
 2868: 
 2869: sleep(T) -> receive after T * 1000 -> ok end.	
 2870: 
 2871: start_node(_DCfg, Name, Param, this) ->
 2872:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 2873:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [this]}]);
 2874: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param, "this") ->
 2875:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 2876:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [this]}]);
 2877: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param, Rel) when is_atom(Rel) ->
 2878:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 2879:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [{release, atom_to_list(Rel)}]}]);
 2880: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param, Rel) when is_list(Rel) ->
 2881:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 2882:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [{release, Rel}]}]).
 2883: 
 2884: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param) ->
 2885:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 2886:     test_server:start_node(Name, slave, [{args, NewParam}]).
 2887: 
 2888: start_node(DCfg, Name) ->
 2889:     start_node(DCfg, Name, "").
 2890: 
 2891: stop_node(Node) ->
 2892:     test_server:stop_node(Node).
 2893: 
 2894: get_nodenames(N, T) ->
 2895:     get_nodenames(N, T, []).
 2896: 
 2897: get_nodenames(0, _, Acc) ->
 2898:     Acc;
 2899: get_nodenames(N, T, Acc) ->
 2900:     U = erlang:unique_integer([positive]),
 2901:     get_nodenames(N-1, T, [list_to_atom(atom_to_list(T)
 2902: 					++ "-"
 2903: 					++ ?MODULE_STRING
 2904: 					++ "-"
 2905: 					++ integer_to_list(U)) | Acc]).
 2906: 
 2907: get_numbered_nodenames(N, T) ->
 2908:     get_numbered_nodenames(N, T, []).
 2909: 
 2910: get_numbered_nodenames(0, _, Acc) ->
 2911:     Acc;
 2912: get_numbered_nodenames(N, T, Acc) ->
 2913:     U = erlang:unique_integer([positive]),
 2914:     NL = [list_to_atom(atom_to_list(T) ++ integer_to_list(N)
 2915: 		       ++ "-"
 2916: 		       ++ ?MODULE_STRING
 2917: 		       ++ "-"
 2918: 		       ++ integer_to_list(U)) | Acc],
 2919:     get_numbered_nodenames(N-1, T, NL).
 2920: 
 2921: wait_until(Fun) ->
 2922:     case Fun() of
 2923: 	true ->
 2924: 	    ok;
 2925: 	_ ->
 2926: 	    receive
 2927: 	    after 100 ->
 2928: 		    wait_until(Fun)
 2929: 	    end
 2930:     end.
 2931: 
 2932: repeat(Fun, 0) when is_function(Fun) ->
 2933:     ok;
 2934: repeat(Fun, N) when is_function(Fun), is_integer(N), N > 0 ->
 2935:     Fun(),
 2936:     repeat(Fun, N-1).
 2937: 
 2938: no_msgs(Wait) ->
 2939:     receive after Wait -> no_msgs() end.
 2940: 
 2941: no_msgs() ->
 2942:     {messages, []} = process_info(self(), messages).
 2943: 
 2944: block_emu(Ms) ->
 2945:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 2946:     Res = erts_debug:set_internal_state(block, Ms),
 2947:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false),
 2948:     Res.
 2949: 
 2950:
